entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 7:43 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:43 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 7:43 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
